jtowers:backup:metadata.description: Back up metadata to a specified directory
examples:
$ sfdx jtowers:backup:metadata --targetusername myOrg@example.com --retrievetargetdir backups 
  Retrieving backup from server... Backup retrieved

$ sfdx jtowers:backup:metadata --targetusername myOrg@example.com --retrievetargetdir backups -t ApexClass ApexTrigger
  Retrieving backup from server... Backup retrieved

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

retrievetargetdir.name: retrievetargetdir
retrievetargetdir.description: directory to save backed up metadata to

targetmetadatatypes.name: targetmetadatatypes
targetmetadatatypes.description: types of metadata to retrieve for backup

excludedmetadatatypes.name: excludedmetadatatypes
excludedmetadatatypes.description: types of metadata to exclude from backup
